vernac_cmds: Definition maximal (F : part_set (part_set X)) (A : part_set X) := in_part A F /\ ~ (exists B : part_set X, in_part B F /\ included A B /\ ~ A =' B in _).
Definition is_chain (F : part_set (part_set X)) := forall A B : part_set X, in_part A F -> in_part B F -> included A B \/ included B A.

Axiom MAXIMAL_PRINCIPLE : forall F : part_set (part_set X), (forall C : part_set (part_set X), is_chain C -> included C F -> exists A : part_set X, in_part A F /\ (forall B : part_set X, in_part B C -> included B A)) -> exists A : part_set X, maximal F A.

Lemma max_lin_indep_subsets_of_generating_sets_are_bases : forall (F : field) (V : vectorspace F) (W : part_set V), generates W (full V) -> forall beta : part_set V, max_lin_indep beta W -> is_basis beta.
apply included_comp with (span W:part_set _) (span beta:part_set _); auto with algebra.
assert (exists x : W, ~ in_part (W x) (span beta:part_set _)).
apply in_part_comp_l with (subtype_elt x); auto with algebra.
Lemma basis_iff_max_lin_indep : forall (F : field) (V : vectorspace F) (beta : part_set V), is_basis beta <-> max_lin_indep beta (full V).
apply in_part_comp_r with (full V); auto with algebra.
Lemma basis_is_max_lin_indep : forall (F : field) (V : vectorspace F) (beta : basis V), max_lin_indep beta (full V).
Lemma max_lin_indep_subset_generated : forall (F : field) (V : vectorspace F) (W : part_set V), lin_indep W -> exists W' : part_set V, max_lin_indep W' (full V) /\ included W W'.
assert (pred_compatible (fun X : part_set V => included W X /\ lin_indep X)).
apply included_comp with W x; auto with algebra.
apply lin_indep_comp with x; auto with algebra.
cut (exists W' : part_set V, maximal FF W').
rename x into W'; exists W'.
apply in_part_comp_r with C; auto with algebra.
assert (forall B : part_set V, in_part B C -> included W B).
assert (exists A : part_set V, in_part A C).
assert (exists A : C, (forall i : fin _, in_part (U (u i)) (C A))).
clear H6 H5 H4 c H2 H.
assert (exists A : C, in_part (U (head u)) (C A)).
apply in_part_comp_l with (U (head u)); auto with algebra.
assert (exists A : C, in_part (U (head u)) (C A)).
generalize (IHn (Seqtl u)); intro p; inversion_clear p.
assert (in_part (C A1) C /\ in_part (C A2345n) C).
split; simpl in |- *; auto with algebra.
clear IHn H3 H1 FF H0 W H2.
apply in_part_comp_l with (U (head u)); auto with algebra.
simpl in |- *; (apply subtype_elt_comp; auto with algebra).
apply in_part_comp_l with (U (Seqtl u (Build_finiteT (lt_S_n _ _ in_range_prf)))); auto with algebra.
simpl in |- *; (apply subtype_elt_comp; auto with algebra).
assert (forall i : fin (S n), in_part (U (Seqtl u i)) (C A1)).
clear IHn H3 H1 FF H0 W.
apply in_part_comp_l with (U (head u)); auto with algebra.
simpl in |- *; (apply subtype_elt_comp; auto with algebra).
apply in_part_comp_l with (U (Seqtl u (Build_finiteT (lt_S_n _ _ in_range_prf)))); auto with algebra.
simpl in |- *; (apply subtype_elt_comp; auto with algebra).
assert (forall i : fin (S n), in_part (Map_embed u i) (C A)).
simpl in H8; (apply H8; auto with algebra).
apply NNPP; intro; (apply H13; auto with algebra).
red in H4; (apply (H4 _ _ H10); auto with algebra).
apply Trans with (sum (mult_by_scalars c (Map_embed u))); auto with algebra.
Lemma every_vecsp_has_a_basis : forall (F : field) (V : vectorspace F), exists beta : part_set V, is_basis beta.
cut (exists beta : part_set V, max_lin_indep beta (full V)).

command: apply included_comp with (span W:part_set _) (span beta:part_set _); auto with algebra.
assert (exists x : W, ~ in_part (W x) (span beta:part_set _)).
apply in_part_comp_l with (subtype_elt x); auto with algebra.
cut (exists beta : part_set V, max_lin_indep beta (full V)).
